text: Mme a oketsa a re, “Tsamayang lo ithute tlhaloso ya temana ya Lokwalo, ‘Ga se ditlhabelo tsa lona le dimpho tsa lona tse ke tshwenyegang ka tsone, ke batla gore lo nne le kutlwelobotlhoko’. Tiro ya me fano mo lefatshing ke go busetsa badiradibe mo Modimong e seng go tshwenyega ka batho ba ba siameng.”
